Check the Weather updated with Today view widget

Oct 5, 2014

Check the Weather updated with Today view widget

My favorite weather app, courtesy of _David Smith just got updated for iOS 8. It includes a a fantastic Today widget, featuring the current temperature atop an hourly and weekly forecast. Buy it.
